about_the_game:
Included

  • Experience Potion(7 days) : Increase gain EXP
  • Lucky Amulet(7 days) : Increase Rare item drop rate
  • Bag Expand 1EA : Increase character's inventory
  • Greater Elixer 10EA : Restroe HP & SD 100%
  • Reinforcement Lubricant 10EA : Increase Reinforcement success rate
  • Exclusive Avatar : Brand new armor avatar for unique players!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
